name: Vortex Aviation Academy
about: Vortex Aviation Suriname is a dynamic and young company dedicated to providing professional aviation training. Founded by Gilbert Samuels, an experienced Flight Instructor, Commercial Pilot, and Certified Aviation Mechanic with nearly 20 years of experience, our mission is to offer affordable and flexible flight training solutions. We aim to create skilled, responsible, and driven aviation experts by emphasizing aviation systems and aeronautical knowledge. Our team customizes training to meet the needs of each student, using a reliable and well-maintained fleet, including the versatile Cessna 172M. We strive to be the driving force behind a safer aviation industry by equipping students with the knowledge and skills to excel as pilots. At Vortex Aviation Suriname, we believe every student should have the tools to adapt to the dynamic nature of aviation.
services: ["Private Pilot License\nCommercial Pilot License\nInstrument Rating License"]
